sampleAnswers: I'm a [Your Major] student at [University] with experience in [Relevant Field]. I've developed strong [Skill 1] and [Skill 2] through my internship at [Company]. I'm excited about [Industry Trend] and want to apply my skills to [Job Function].
My key strengths are [Strength 1], [Strength 2], and [Strength 3]. For example, at my last internship, I used [Strength 1] to [Specific Achievement] which resulted in [Quantifiable Outcome].
One area I'm improving is [Weakness]. I've been working on this by [Action Taken], and I've seen improvement in [Positive Change]. I plan to continue developing this skill through [Future Action].

I want this position because it aligns perfectly with my experience in [Field] and my passion for [Industry Aspect]. I'm particularly impressed by [Company Project/Value] and believe I could contribute to [Specific Area].

In five years, I see myself having mastered [Key Skill] and contributing significantly to [Company Goal]. I hope to take on more responsibility in [Area] while continuing to develop my expertise in [Specialty].
